name: I can't wait to see the headlines when the press learns of this interview.
I'll just write that down in my notebook.
That would've been my choice, as well.
Are you proud of how you answered that question? Don't bother trying to answer this one.
I didn't take you for that sort of person!
Are you sure? There's no going back!
I hope you understand, I wouldn't ask these questions if I didn't need to know the answers.
I hope you thought it through before you made your pick!
This is the sort of journalism that has sustained my career for more than a decade now. Yes, I'm proud of what I do!
